name: raftraftraft
description:
Attempt to travel as far as you can on your tiny, fragile raft! Collect driftwood to repair your raft before all of it lies at the bottom of the sea...

An endless paddling action game, where any bit of carelessness will lead to the destruction of your valuable raft.

Featuring:
  • Cute, charming pixel art!
  • Rocks
  • Berserk whales!
  • Destructible rafts!
  • More rocks
  • Raft-building
  • Water
Controls
  • Arrow keys to walk and swim
  • X (hold) to use paddle
  • Z or C to switch to build mode
  • X to place raft block (when in build mode)

P.S. If online high-scores are your thing, you can play the game on Kongregate.
